attributes.action: Act to prevent the grounding on 1st july of DC3 Dakotas due to EU legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that the EU is interferring with the enjoyment of others again.
The DC3 Dakota was instrumental in keeping post war Berlin fed and watered.
The EU now propose to ground the type permenantly.

Fight to prevent this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Act to prevent the grounding on 1st july of DC3 Dakotas due to EU legislation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18785


Prime Minister's Office
